title: Gen. McChrystal: 'We're Fighting a National Fight'
itunes:title: Gen. McChrystal: 'We're Fighting a National Fight'
description:
General Stanley McChrystal, Founder of McChrystal Group and former Commander of the Joint Special Operations in Iraq, discusses the need for strong leadership to manage the coronavirus outbreak. He says leaders need to be transparent and provide data, not only to help individual states, but to aid the nation in the battle against the pandemic.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
